rhinoscriptsyntax (rhino3d.com)

code_blocks.code:
import rhinoCSriptsyntax as rs
view = rs.CurrentView()
target = rs.ViewTarget(view)
camplane = rs.ViewCameraPlane(view)
plane = rs.MovePlane(camplane, target)
rs.ViewCPlane( view, plane )
